Description: Fragment of a quartzite sandstone statue of a priest: part of the leopard-skin robe; Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: Published: Les amour d'une princesse égyptienne, Saint-Gérard 1997, p.134 [143].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 May-Oct, Abbaye Saint-Gerard De Brogne, Le Roman de la momie 1998/9 Oct-Jun, South Carolina, The Charleston Museum, Queens Commoners of the New Kingdom
